axis_supply.supply_status: Adequate for defensive operations. Division newly arrived in North Africa (August 1942), last major German reinforcement to reach theater. Initial supply state better than veteran divisions but still constrained by long Mediterranean supply lines. Primary supply base at Benghazi (700km west) and Tobruk. Water supply critical for newly acclimatized troops in desert conditions.

notes: Integrated into British 8th Army supply system
El Alamein defensive posture - static defense, low fuel consumption
